mapper.select:
select distinct d.app_id from OPAS_FILE_APPLICATION_DETAIL d left join OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 c on d.APP_ID = c.APP_ID where d.flag = '2'
AND d.APP_ID = #{appId} AND d.APP_ID like '${appId2}%'
AND d.APP_RESULT = #{result}
AND c.C4_RUSHFLG in (${rushFlag})
select input_channel from opas_biz_inp_appl_c1 where app_id = #{appId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select (decode(approval.approve_result, '1', 'A', '0', 'D')) as result_code, approval.approve_credit_limit credit_limit, (decode(approval.approve_result, '1', '100', '0', (select code.uni_reason_code from OPAS_APPROVE_REASONCODE code where approval.refuse_code1 = code.reason_code)) ) as reason_code from OPAS_BIZ_APPROVAL approval where approval.app_id = #{appId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT c1.APP_BANK, c1.APP_ID, c1.APP_PROD, c1.APP_FLAG, c1.APP_FLOWST, c1.APP_CODE, c1.APP_ACCTYP, c1.C1_BRNCH, c1.C1_CARDNBR, c1.C1_IDTYPE, c1.C1_IDNBR, c1.C1_SECNBR, c1.C1_CNAME, c1.C1_ENAME, opas_biz_inp_appl_c2 c2, (select APP_ID from opas_file_application_detail) detail, (SELECT c11.app_id, decode(c11.ydj_flag, '2', (select r.RATE_CODE from OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE b left join OPAS_SYSPARM_RATE_CONF r on b.CIF_LABEL = r.cust_level_tag where b.app_id = c11.app_id), '1', (decode(c11.MATCHING_CARD_FLAG, '1', (select r.RATE_CODE from OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE b1 left join OPAS_SYSPARM_RATE_CONF r on b1.CIF_LABEL = r.cust_level_tag where b1.app_id = c11.app_id), (select r.RATE_CODE from OPAS_FICO_YDJ_BLAZE y left join OPAS_SYSPARM_RATE_CONF r on y.CIF_LABEL = r.cust_level_tag where y.app_id = c11.app_id)))) as C5_INTCODE from OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 c11) kk where c2.app_id = c1.app_id and c1.app_id = detail.app_id and c1.app_id = kk.app_id and c1.app_id in (${_parameter})
